config.script:
# Check the instances of "Light Mast" UDT type in the areaPath
	instances = []
	res = system.tag.browse(self.params.areaPath, {"tagType": "UdtInstance", "recursive": True, 'typeId': 'Common/Light Mast'})
	for result in res.getResults():
	    deviceTagPath = result["fullPath"]
	
	    # Check if the light mast instance is enabled. It is done by checking if the "contactor 2 on" tag is enabled for the instance
	    modeTagEnabledPath = "{}/Status/Contactor 2 On.Enabled".format(deviceTagPath)
	    modeTagEnabled = system.tag.read(modeTagEnabledPath)
	
	    if modeTagEnabled.value:
	        instances.append({"deviceTagPath": result["fullPath"], "deviceName": result["name"]})
	
	# Assign the 'instances' list to the custom property to make it available in the view.
	self.custom.instances = instances

# Check the instances of "Light Mast" UDT type in the areaPath
	instances = []
	res = system.tag.browse(self.params.areaPath1, {"tagType": "UdtInstance", "recursive": True, 'typeId': 'Common/Light Mast'})
	for result in res.getResults():
	    deviceTagPath = result["fullPath"]
	
	    # Check if the light mast instance is enabled. It is done by checking if the "contactor 2 on" tag is enabled for the instance
	    modeTagEnabledPath = "{}/Status/Contactor 2 On.Enabled".format(deviceTagPath)
	    modeTagEnabled = system.tag.read(modeTagEnabledPath)
	
	    if modeTagEnabled.value:
	        instances.append({"deviceTagPath": result["fullPath"], "deviceName": result["name"]})
	
	# Assign the 'instances' list to the custom property to make it available in the view.
	self.custom.instances1 = instances

instances = self.view.custom.instances
	for instance in instances:
		tagParterPath = instance['deviceTagPath']
		tagname = "Control/Lights Off Command"
		writeTags = '{}/{}'.format(tagParterPath, tagname)
		system.tag.writeBlocking(writeTags, 1)

instances = self.view.custom.instances
	for instance in instances:
		tagParterPath = instance['deviceTagPath']
		tagname = "Control/Lights 50pct Command"
		writeTags = '{}/{}'.format(tagParterPath, tagname)
		system.tag.writeBlocking(writeTags, 1)

instances = self.view.custom.instances
	for instance in instances:
		tagParterPath = instance['deviceTagPath']
		tagname = "Control/Lights 100pct Command"
		writeTags = '{}/{}'.format(tagParterPath, tagname)
		system.tag.writeBlocking(writeTags, 1)

instances = self.view.custom.instances1
	for instance in instances:
		tagParterPath = instance['deviceTagPath']
		tagname = "Control/Lights Off Command"
		writeTags = '{}/{}'.format(tagParterPath, tagname)
		system.tag.writeBlocking(writeTags, 1)

instances = self.view.custom.instances1
	for instance in instances:
		tagParterPath = instance['deviceTagPath']
		tagname = "Control/Lights 50pct Command"
		writeTags = '{}/{}'.format(tagParterPath, tagname)
		system.tag.writeBlocking(writeTags, 1)

instances = self.view.custom.instances1
	for instance in instances:
		tagParterPath = instance['deviceTagPath']
		tagname = "Control/Lights 100pct Command"
		writeTags = '{}/{}'.format(tagParterPath, tagname)
		system.tag.writeBlocking(writeTags, 1)

params.LabelOverride: Giovanni Brunetti Bridge Retention Pit Pumps
params.deviceName: Giovanni Brunetti Bridge Retention Pit Pumps
